alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 23 at 2:41PM MST until June 23 at 3:45PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM MST FOR MARICOPA AND PINAL COUNTIES... At 241 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Maricopa, or 16 miles southwest of Sun Lakes, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Maricopa, Estrella Sailport, Olberg, Stanfield and Ak-Chin Village. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 177 and 178. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 144 and 165. AZ Route 238 between mile markers 34 and 44. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
